scenes.text: After arriving to the house, Urlac observes the target.

choices.A: He kills the target with his bow.
choices.B: He decides his target is not worth killing.

scenes.text: He had to decide to either flee the crime scene or to stay and pottentially get caught.

chapterDescription: In the beginning of our story we meet Urlac, an assassin who is his own boss and his adventures.
